sense.def:
To force someone to do something
pomeni povzročiti, da nekdo nekaj stori, čeprav tega noče.

seg.quote: She forced herself to kiss her mother's cheek.
...the campaign to force the closure of the factory.
Weekend gales forced him to change his plans.

sense.def:
To force something into a particular position
pomeni z močjo in prisilo doseči, da se nekaj nekam premakne.

To force a lock, door, or safe
pomeni razbiti ključavnico ali nasilno odpreti vrata ali blagajno.

seg.quote: We have renounced the use of force to settle our disputes.
I hit him with all the force I could muster.

sense.def:
To be a force in a situation
pomeni imeti velik vpliv na neki položaj.

seg.quote: Britain is re-establishing itself as a powerful force in world affairs.

sense.def:
V fiziki je
a force
privlačna ali odbojna moč, ki jo ima ena stvar na drugo.

A force
je tudi organizirana skupina vojakov ali oboroženih oseb.

To force one's way into a place
pomeni odrivati ali lomiti predmete, ki so nam napoti, da bi prišli v neki kraj.

Kadar nekdo nekaj stori
from force of habit
, to stori, ker je bil to navajen početi v preteklosti.

Zakon ali sistem, ki je
in force
, velja oziroma je v uporabi.

Kdor
joins forces with someone
, dela z nekom, da bi dosegla skupni cilj.
